segments.en: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of not using chew sticks.

segments.pli: Acakkhussaṃ, mukhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti, rasaharaṇiyo na visujjhanti, pittaṃ semhaṃ bhattaṃ pariyonandhati, bhattamassa nacchādeti.
segments.en: It’s not good for your eyes, you get bad breath, your taste-buds aren’t cleaned, bile and phlegm cover your food, and you lose your appetite.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dantakaṭṭhassa akhādane.
segments.en: These are the five drawbacks of not using chew sticks.
There are these five benefits of using chew sticks.

segments.pli: Cakkhussaṃ, mukhaṃ na duggandhaṃ hoti, rasaharaṇiyo visujjhanti, pittaṃ semhaṃ bhattaṃ na pariyonandhati, bhattamassa chādeti.
segments.en: It’s good for your eyes, you don’t get bad breath, your taste-buds are cleaned, bile and phlegm don’t cover your food, and food agrees with you.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā dantakaṭṭhassa khādane”ti.
segments.en: These are the five benefits of using chew sticks.”
